text: Gerra (Verzasca) was a municipality of the district Locarno in the canton of Ticino in Switzerland. On 20 April 2008, the former municipalities of Cugnasco and Gerra (Verzasca) merged to form the new municipality of Cugnasco-Gerra. == Other websites == * Official website Category:Former municipalities of Ticino Category:2008 disestablishments in Switzerland
title: Gerra (Verzasca)
